column4: im new w/ ubuntu. i need to install ubuntu in my laptop (compaq presario V2000) w/ mobile AMD Turion 64 Processor. Can I install the latest version of Ubuntu, the one in the download site "64-bit PC (AMD64) install CD"
thanks! Im running windows XP service pack 2 at the moment... what would i do so that i will have both ubuntu and windows xp in my laptop and my files wont be deleted?
just don't let the installer touch the windows partition :)
